name: Triangle Wars
description:
For now it's just an Asteroids inspired game, but who knows? space has a lot of things to offer. Just the right people will unleash all the secrets of the Triangle Wars.

Objective:

Get the highest score you can!

Controls:

  • Use arrow keys to move around.
  • Use Z key to shoot your enemies.

Game made for the primitive jam.

Note:

Player sprite was made by Rosalila Studio for their game Flatshot and released under CC
